statement.content:
Welcome everyone! I'm cautomaton, head of engineering and all things tech at Singularity 6. Super excited to share what our team has been working on.

We're doing fun facts, huh?

- Aside from Palia, I live in emacs.
- My love of games extends from the screen to the tabletop.
- Wouldn't be here without the support of my wife & two kids.
